title: Akriai
description: Akriai or Acriae was a settlement of ancient Laconia, located to the south of the modern Greek village of Kokkinia (municipality of Evrotas). According to Strabo, the Eurotas river flows into the sea between Akriai and Gythium.

properties.description: Coordinates determined in Google Earth with reference to description in ToposText and geolocated photos (via Google) by Mixalis Leimonitis showing archaeological remains of uncertain date.
properties.title: Imagery location of visible excavation
